text: Trainer Friendliness - 10/10. Equipments - 9/10. Training Routine - 9.5/10. Diet Plan - 9/10. Budget Friendly - 10/10 (Best in Competition). Open- Monday to Saturday.
Very good gym, owner is also very good. Doing gym since 2019 and haven't faced a single problem ever. Good equipment, love this gym.
Good quantity of machines but quality rating of machines is 3/5. 50rs per trial, 800 per month, Quarterly 2100, many more fee structures.
Best priced, excellent faculty. Just a little bit congested, everything else is absolutely fine.
Gym has been built recently yet quite popular. All equipments and sittings are new and perfect. Trainer is professional and hard working. Relaxed environment. Must visit.
Awesome gym with experienced trainer. Equipment are of high quality and brand new. Love the environment there. Fees is reasonable and affordable.
Clean space, updated equipment, ease of parking. Trainer is attentive and extremely knowledgeable. He creates workouts that are enjoyable and exactly what one requires.
One of the best gyms I've ever seen. Large space, full of equipment, friendly environment, personal trainers, diet charts, nutrition and supplements all make this gym number 1.
This gym is situated in front of my computer classes.

Wow, where do I start? The equipment looks like it was rescued from a junkyard, the staff acts like you're invisible, and the whole place smells like a locker room from the 1980s. 'State-of-the-art' must be a joke here because nothing works. If you want to pay to get a disease, this is your spot! Worst gym experience ever, such a waste of money.
Better gym as compared to other gyms with same fee structure.
Very good gym for ladies & gents also. And trainer Aditya Pratap Singh Sir is the best trainer as compared to other gyms.
